tool_description: Enrich your people or organization data with over 100 datapoints. Get an API key here:  https://www.apollo.io/app/#/settings/integrations/api
name: Apollo Enrichment
title: Apollo Enrichment

api_list.name: Enrich People
api_list.description: Use this endpoint to enrich your people data
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://apollo-enrichment.p.rapidapi.com/people/match"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "apollo-enrichment.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://apollo-enrichment.p.rapidapi.com/people/match"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "apollo-enrichment.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
